Posts.Content: Hi Jeanne, I'm really new on Tamoxifen. Started it in Jan '09. Can't say that I've noticed too many side affects. Can't really determined if side affects are from other things. I had maybe one or two hot flashes at night, but now I really can't see any. I'm wondering if it's working. I read somewhere where if you have experienced the flashes, that there's a lower reoccurance of cancer. Can't tell you where I read that, but anyway, good luck. So far, no complaints. I've been tired, but can't tell if it's my lifestyle currently or the drug, too many variables. Take Care! Lisa
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen..How did everyone do on it??
